Getting started readme.md

ngFormLib

About the project

Angular Form Library is a set of Angular components that allow you to configure how form validation works across your entire site, plus a set of accessibility-aware input controls that are easy to integrate into your AngularJS 1.2+ application.

Designed with Bootstrap CSS styles and markup in mind, Angular Form Library can be easily customised to work with your existing CSS and form markup.

Quick Start

Install and manage Angular Form Library with NPM.

      
        $ npm install angular-form-lib --save

Dependencies

Angular Form Library has a dependency on Angular 1.2+. You must load Angular 1.2+ yourself.

Additionally, angular-scroll and angular-translate are optional dependencies which will be used if loaded. Angular Scroll provides smooth-scrolling to an element that receives focus (such as the first error-field in a form). Angular Translate allows strings to be loaded from resource files, which can help standardise error messages.

Inject the ngFormLibmodule into your Angular application.

      
        // ES5
        angular.module('myApp', ['ngFormLib']);

        // ES6 / Webpack
        import {ngFormLib} from 'angular-form-lib';

        const app = angular.module('myApp', [ngFormLib]);

Typically you would load both the module and the default policies into your application:

      
        // ES5
        angular.module('myApp', [
          'ngFormLib',
          'duScroll',   // Scrolling behaviour for when the state changes to an error and we wish to focus the field
          'ngFormLib.policy.behaviourOnStateChange',
          'ngFormLib.policy.checkForStateChanges',
          'ngFormLib.policy.stateDefinitions',
          'pascalprecht.translate'    // Adds translation support, which will be used for certain properties when available
        ]);

        // ES6 / Webpack
        import {ngFormLib, defaultPolicies} from 'angular-form-lib';
        import 'angular-scroll';   // Scrolling behaviour for when the state changes to an error and we wish to focus the field
        import ngTranslate from 'angular-translate';

        const app = angular.module('myApp', ['duScroll', ngTranslate, ngFormLib, defaultPolicies]);

Custom builds

Angular Form Library provides independently built modules that can be loaded separately:

        
          angular.module('myApp', [ 'ngFormLib.policy', 'ngFormLib.controls.formInput']);

Message translation

Angular Form Library will optionally use the pascalprecht.translate module and the $translate.instant() method to perform translation of error messages, placeholder text, field hints and labels, if the module has been loaded. See Angular Translate.

Contributing

      
        // Fork https://github.com/odecee/angular-form-lib.git on Github
        mkdir {newDir}
        cd {newDir}
        git clone {your forked repo}
        npm i commitizen -g   // Install commitizen to help generate conventional commit messages
        npm i

        // Serve and watch docs, ideal to develop
        $ npm start
        // Continuous integration
        $ npm test
        // Build Angular Form Library and serve documentation site
        $ npm build:serve

        // Make some changes then commit them
        git add.
        git cz
        // Then create pull request with your changes, push to GitHub, get feedback, rinse, repeat, merge.
